clinical_study.brief_title: Patient Characteristics, Feasibility, and Outcomes of a Home Mechanical Ventilation Program in a Developing Country
clinical_study.official_title: Patient Characteristics, Feasibility, and Outcomes of a Home Mechanical Ventilation Program in a Developing Country

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to describe the patient characteristics, feasibility, and outcomes of an home mechanical ventilation (HMV) program at a university hospital in Thailand.

detailed_description.textblock: Data will be collected on all patients who were discharged with HMV between October 2014 and August 2015 at Thammasat University Hospital. Data include sex, age, co-morbid diseases, clinical features, causes of HMV, mechanical ventilator and complimentary equipment characteristics, caregiver characteristics, ventilator and patient care costs, and morbidity and mortality outcomes of patients.

primary_outcome.description: The number of deaths among HMV patients is recorded during follow-up period (up to 1 year)

secondary_outcome.description: Record the number of healthcare home visits (events)
Record the number of caregivers per patient, the number of well-trained caregivers
Record types (relationships) and the number of family members, income to costs ratio
Record the number of tracheobronchitis (events) and the number of hospitalizations due to their effects

secondary_outcome.measure: HMV complications due to ventilator-associated pneumonia
secondary_outcome.description: Record the number of ventilator-associated pneumonias (events) and the number of hospitalizations due to their effects

secondary_outcome.measure: HMV complications due to the loose tracheostomy
secondary_outcome.description: Record the number of loose tracheostomies (events) and the number of hospitalizations due to their effects

secondary_outcome.measure: HMV complications due to the granulation-tissue formation at tracheostomy
secondary_outcome.description: Record the number of granulation-tissue formations at tracheostomy (events) and the number of hospitalizations due to their effects
Record the number of pneumothoraces (events) and the number of hospitalizations due to their effects

secondary_outcome.measure: HMV complications due to the ventilator malfunction
secondary_outcome.description: The number of ventilator malfunctions (events) and the number of hospitalizations due to their effects

study_pop.textblock: All hospitalized patients requiring mechanical ventilation.

- All hospitalized patients requiring mechanical ventilation aged 18 or more years.
